alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:29PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cache and east central Box Elder Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 528 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bear River City, or 7 miles southeast of Tremonton, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brigham City, Tremonton, Wellsville, Bear River City, Corinne, Peter, Garland, Honeyville, Mendon, Elwood, Deweyville, Collinston and Bear River. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 367 and 385. Interstate 84 between mile markers 39 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
